about_the_game:
Greenhaven Realms invites you to a captivating journey through a richly detailed fantasy medieval world. As an intrepid adventurer, you'll dive into an expansive realm filled with endless opportunities and challenges.

Face formidable foes and hone your skills in battle to become a true hero. Beyond the battlefield, the game offers deep crafting mechanics, allowing you to create powerful weapons, enchanted armor, and valuable items to aid your journey.

Gather resources from lush forests, rugged mountains, and hidden caves. Mine precious ores and unearth hidden treasures that will help you thrive in this vibrant world. Trade goods with other players and NPCs to build your wealth and strengthen your influence.

Explore diverse and dynamic environments, each brimming with secrets and adventures. From ancient ruins to bustling marketplaces, every corner of Greenhaven holds new discoveries and challenges.


Build and expand your kingdom, shaping it to your vision and fortifying it against the many dangers that lie ahead. With strategic decisions and careful planning, you’ll lead your realm to greatness.

In Greenhaven Realms, your choices matter and your destiny is in your hands. Dive into a world where every moment is an adventure and every action can change the course of your story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Greenhaven Realms is a fantasy medieval Idle RPG where players embark on epic adventures. Engage in thrilling combats, craft powerful items, gather resources, mine for treasures, trade goods, and explore vast lands. Build your kingdom and shape your destiny in the enchanting world of Greenhaven.
